function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission through respiratory droplets and airborne particles","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and rapid spread of SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection, maintaining physical distance, wearing masks","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV-C disinfection, ventilation systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, building occupants","Owner":"Public health organizations, building management"},{"Description":"Potential airborne transmission in specific situations","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion in enclosed spaces and poor ventilation","Mitigation":"Use of caution in operating HVAC systems, improved ventilation, air quality monitoring","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality sensors, ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, facility managers","Owner":"Building management, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Survival of SARS-CoV-2 in the air and on indoor surfaces","Impact":"Risk of prolonged exposure and indirect transmission through surface contact","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of indoor surfaces, proper ventilation, air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Surface disinfection systems, air filtration systems, air quality sensors","People":"General public, building occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building management, public health organizations"}]}
